alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 6:47AM AKST until December 21 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Petersburg, Wrangell, Whale Pass, and Coffman Cove areas. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Tuesday morning. Snow density will be dry and accumulate quickly.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
